Name: progressive familial heart block type IA
Definition: A progressive familial heart block characterized by autosomal dominant inheritance of cardiac bundle branch disorder that may progress to complete heart block that has_material_basis_in mutation in the SCN5A gene on chromosome 3p21.

Name: progressive familial heart block type II
Definition: A progressive familial heart block characterized by autosomal dominant inheritance of  heart block that tends to develop along the lines of a sinus bradycardia with a left posterior hemiblock

Name: progressive familial heart block type IB
Definition: A progressive familial heart block characterized by that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the TRPM4 gene on chromosome 19q13.
